attributes.action: Prevent ISPs selling our personal details to 3rd parties, prevent ISPs forwarding all our web viewing to 3rd parties for use of data mining and use the excuse of placing local adverts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your request is fine but the extra detail contains unsubstantiated claims.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
